sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function FormComponent(props) { return (
You Varior?
You Vegan?
You Lucky?

Your name: {props.firstName}

Your Last Name: {props.lastName}

Your Age: {props.age}

Your Gender: {props.gender}

Varior: {props.directoryRegistretion.isVarior ? "True" : "False"}

Vegan: {props.directoryRegistretion.isVegan ? "True" : "False"}

Luky: {props.directoryRegistretion.isLuky ? "True" : "False"}

) } export default FormComponent
